data:
Introducing reFlow Bridge, the innovative solution revolutionizing FiveM development workflows.With its advanced capabilities, reFlow Bridge takes the hassle out of detecting frameworks, inventory, and targets, all automatically. Guarenteed to noticably shorten development time, and streamline supporting all the different frameworks by only having to update & maintain a SINGLE version.
Trusted by numerous developers across the FiveM Scene, reFlow Bridge is the cornerstone of efficient development, supported by our robust software license agreement.Discover the future of development with reFlow Bridge.
data.download-resource#Download Resource: To get started first download the bridge, it's included with any asset purchased from reflow-store.com login into keymaster and you will find the bridge under the option Granted Assets
data.installation#Installation: Open the downloaded resource zip file and drag the folder into your servers resources folder
data.starting-order#Starting Order:
In order for the bridge to detect your resources and start correctly, you must start the resources before running the script
-- Any Supported Framework, Inventory, Target
ensure framework
ensure inventory
ensure target
-- Start Bridge After
ensure reFlow-Bridge
-- Start Script After Bridge
ensure reFlow-ScriptName

data.export#Export:
Using The Dialog Export Function
OpenDialog(target, data)
target: number | vector4
data: table
title: string
text: string
animate?: boolean
dialog?: table
buttons: table[]
text: string
client?: string
server?: string
export?: function(args)
tags?: table[]
text: string

data.download-resource#Download Resource: To get started first download your asset previously purchased from reflow-store.com login into keymaster and you will find your resource under the option Granted Assets
data.installation#Installation: Open the downloaded resource zip file and drag the folder into your servers resources folder

data: Dialog allows you to build a new way to interact.Take your server interactions to the next level with this dialog interaction script, intergrate with ease by using the provided exports to setup the button actions, add dialog tags, trigger client/server events. exports or call a new dialog the possibilities are endless.
reFlow-Hunting sets the stage for three unique & dynamic ways to hunt animalsThe last hunting script you'll ever need! Check the preview below

data.add-weapon#Add Weapon:
Also Add weapon_dartgun to DurabilityMultiplier or DurabilityBlockedWeapons depending on whats prefered for your server in the qb-weapons/config.lua
weapon_dartgun = { name = 'weapon_dartgun', label = 'Dart Gun', weight = 1000, type = 'weapon', ammotype = "AMMO_DART", image = 'WEAPON_DARTGUN.png', unique = true, useable = false, description = 'A Dart Gun That Shoots Tranquilizer Darts' },
[`weapon_dartgun`]= { name = 'weapon_dartgun', label = 'Dart Gun', weapontype = 'Pistol', ammotype = 'AMMO_DART', damagereason = 'Tranquilized' },
Also Add weapon_dartgun to DurabilityMultiplier or DurabilityBlockedWeapons depending on whats prefered for your server in the qs-inventory/config/weapons.lua
weapon_dartgun = { name = 'weapon_dartgun', label = 'Dart Gun', weight = 1000, type = 'weapon', ammotype = "AMMO_DART", image = 'WEAPON_DARTGUN.png', unique = true, useable = false, description = 'A Dart Gun That Shoots Tranquilizer Darts' },
[`weapon_dartgun`] = { name = 'weapon_dartgun', label = 'Dart Gun', weapontype = 'Pistol', ammotype = 'AMMO_DART', damagereason = 'Tranquilized' },
['WEAPON_DARTGUN'] = { 
    label = 'Dart Gun', 
    weight = 1000, 
    ammoname = "ammo-dart"
},
Also Add weapon_dartgun to DurabilityMultiplier or DurabilityBlockedWeapons depending on whats prefered for your server in the codem-inventory/config/durability.lua
weapon_dartgun = { name = 'weapon_dartgun', label = 'Dart Gun', weight = 1000, type = 'weapon', ammotype = "AMMO_DART", image = 'WEAPON_DARTGUN.png', unique = true, useable = false, description = 'A Dart Gun That Shoots Tranquilizer Darts' },
data.add-ammo#Add Ammo:
Make sure to double check the qb-weapons:client:AddAmmo event in other ammo as your version might be different
dart_ammo = { name = 'dart_ammo', label = 'Dart Ammo', weight = 200, type = 'item', image = 'ammo-dartgun.png', unique = false, useable = true, shouldClose = true, combinable = nil, description = 'Tranquilizer Darts For A Dart Gun' },
QBCore.Functions.CreateUseableItem('dart_ammo', function(source, item)
    TriggerClientEvent('qb-weapons:client:AddAmmo', source, 'AMMO_DART', 1, item)
end)
dart_ammo = { name = 'dart_ammo', label = 'Dart Ammo', weight = 200, type = 'item', image = 'ammo-dartgun.png', unique = false, useable = true, shouldClose = true, combinable = nil, description = 'Tranquilizer Darts For A Dart Gun' },
CreateUsableItem('dart_ammo', function(source, item)
    TriggerClientEvent('weapons:client:AddAmmo', source, 'AMMO_DART', 1, item)
end)
['ammo-dart'] = {
	label = 'Dart Ammo',
	weight = 200,
},
dart_ammo = { name = 'dart_ammo', label = 'Dart Ammo', weight = 200, type = 'item', image = 'ammo-dartgun.png', unique = false, useable = true, shouldClose = true, combinable = nil, description = 'Tranquilizer Darts For A Dart Gun' },
{ item = 'dart_ammo', ammoType = 'AMMO_DART', amount = 1 },
data.add-images#Add Images:
qb-inventory/html/images/
qs-inventory/html/images/
ox_inventory/web/images/
codem-inventory/html/itemimages/
Once you've added the items to your inventory, the next step is to drag and drop the images into the path mentioned above.
You can find these images in the resource you downloaded from Keymaster inside the images folder.

data: Welcome to the official documentation of reFlow Store, here you will find the installation guides for each resource in our store

data.download-resource#Download Resource: To get started first download your asset previously purchased from reflow-store.com login into keymaster and you will find your resource under the option Granted Assets
data.installation#Installation: Open the downloaded resource zip file and drag the folder into your servers resources folder
data.starting-order#Starting Order:
In order for the bridge to detect your resources and start correctly, you must start the resources before running the script
-- Any Supported Framework, Inventory, Target
ensure framework
ensure inventory
ensure target
-- Start Script After
ensure reFlow-Pizzaria

data.add-images#Add Images:
qb-inventory/html/images/
qs-inventory/html/images/
ox_inventory/web/images/
Once you've added the items to your inventory, the next step is to drag and drop the images into the path mentioned above.
You can find these images in the resource you downloaded from Keymaster inside the images folder.

data: Pizzaria allows you to run the Pizza This Italian pizza chain as a business, the ultimate pizzeria script for your server. Whether you're a seasoned pizzaiolo or a budding entrepreneur, this script is here to make your pizzeria dreams come true.
Guide to install reFlow Vanilla Unicorn.
data.download-resource#Download Resource: To get started first download your asset previously purchased from reflow-store.com login into keymaster and you will find your resource under the option Granted Assets
data.installation#Installation: Open the downloaded resource zip file and drag the folder into your servers resources folder
data.starting-order#Starting Order:
In order for the bridge to detect your resources and start correctly, you must start the resources before running the script
-- Any Supported Framework, Inventory, Target
ensure framework
ensure inventory
ensure target
-- Start Script After
ensure reFlow-VanillaU

data.add-images#Add Images:
qb-inventory/html/images/
qs-inventory/html/images/
ox_inventory/web/images/
Once you've added the items to your inventory, the next step is to drag and drop the images into the path mentioned above.
You can find these images in the resource you downloaded from Keymaster inside the images folder.

data: reFlow-VanillaU allows you to run the Strip Club as a business. You can run the place as normal with players doing all of the roles OR you can HIRE PEDS to staff the place, filling in any missing positions. The peds can act as Bouncers, Dancers, and Waitresses.
